description:
DXVK 2.6 Vulkan-based implementation of D3D9, D3D10, and D3D11 for Linux / Wine is now available for download with improvements for several games.

The post DXVK 2.6 Adds NVIDIA Reflex Support, Improvements for Many Games appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: DXVK 2.6 Adds NVIDIA Reflex Support, Improvements for Many Games
